casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Raymond L. HUFF. No. D-2895. Supreme Court of the United States May 16, 2016.

Raymond L. Huff, of Peoria, Illinois, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
